Interface DNS_Utils


  • public interface DNS_Utils
    The DNS_Utils interface implements a repository of constant settings and helper functions for HW1 program.
    Since:
    2017-09-04
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Abdulrahman Zaiter

      • sendUDPRequest

        static void sendUDPRequest(java.lang.String requestString,
                           java.lang.String hostString,
                           int port,
                           java.net.DatagramSocket socket)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        A method that sends a UDP string request using datagram packets and socket.
        Parameters:
        requestString - the string request to be used.
        hostString - the string of the hostname of the target device.
        port - the port used in the UDP communication
        socket - the socket instance used to initialize UDP connection
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an exception is thrown if the socket hasn't had a proper UDP connection.

      • receiveUDPRequest

        static javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.net.DatagramPacket> receiveUDPRequest(java.net.DatagramSocket socket,
                                                                                    int bufferSize)
                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        A method that receives a UDP string request from UDP datagram server.
        Parameters:
        socket - the socket instance used to initialize the UDP connection
        bufferSize - the buffer size used to store read data
        Returns:
        a string of the request sent from the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an exception is thrown if the socket hasn't had a proper UDP connection
